Text:
yeah at last...great to have this cult classic one in 1080p...thnx for considering my request!!!
very happy ... :))))))

Thanks for this Marlon Brando flick !!!

This is an offer i can't refuse ;)

And also i updated the new controversial titles.

Are you comfortable if i post them now ?
Sure. The Demoniacs is still a possibility (already encoded, so will probably UL). Maybe Salon Kitty also. I've also added Klip and The Secretary to the list.

Thanks for accepting the list :)

Cheers !!!
Tyvm for the updated list. I won't be doing all of them, but I promise to get a good chunk of those done over the next few weeks.

It's great to hear !!

I know how hard it is to download source and encoding them & upload, then seeding.
Besides you are already loaded with huge requests and still you are encouraging requests, it's so kind of you. Actually we should thank you for your effort and time :)

Thank you for the nice movie. 
Any chance for the movie "Crazy Heart" (2009) ?

@ onlyHD - Ernest and Celestine is a controversial movie? It doesn't seem to fit with the rest of those on the list...unless there's another Ernest and Celestine that's not about a mouse and a bear. Am I missing something? lol
I don't know how that movie got here lol :)

Now i get it.

Instead of Monster's Ball (2001) was replaced by Ernest and Celestine (2012) accidentally lol :)
